hero.title: Focused chat built for work.
hero.description: Xinchat Work+ keeps freelancers and small teams aligned with text-only chat, fast notes, sketches, and built-in AI so you can move from talking to doing without distractions.

primaryFeatures.title: Communicate, think, and organize in one workspace.
primaryFeatures.description: Chat, notes, sketches, and AI stay together so you can work faster without switching apps.

Register.title: Focused text-only chat
Register.description: Keep 1:1 and small group conversations clean, organized, and work-first—no social noise.

Contact.title: Built-in GPT assistant
Contact.description: Ask questions, draft replies, summarize long threads, or brainstorm ideas without leaving the chat.

Profile.title: Notes and sketches in one tab
Profile.description: Capture action items, client details, and quick diagrams beside your chats so you never lose context.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.description: Thank you for choosing Xinchat Work+! By downloading, accessing, or using our mobile application ("App"), you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions ("Terms"). If you do not agree with any of these Terms, please refrain from using the App.
terms.end: By using Xinchat Work+, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms.

Use of the Application.title: Use of the Application
Use of the Application.description: Xinchat Work+ is provided on an "as-is" and "as-available" basis. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the App at any time without prior notice. You agree to use the App only for lawful purposes and in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.

User Accounts.title: User Accounts
User Accounts.description: While using Xinchat Work+, you agree not to:
User Accounts.bullet1: To access certain features of the App, you may be required to create an account.
User Accounts.bullet2: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and are solely responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
User Accounts.bullet3: You agree not to share your account details or use another user’s account without permission.
User Accounts.bullet4: If you suspect any unauthorized use of your account, you must notify us immediately.

Prohibited Conduct.title: Prohibited Conduct
Prohibited Conduct.description: While using Xinchat Work+, you agree not to:
Prohibited Conduct.bullet1: Engage in any illegal or unauthorized activity.
Prohibited Conduct.bullet2: Upload or share harmful, abusive, or objectionable content, including but not limited to hate speech or explicit materials.
Prohibited Conduct.bullet3: Use Xinchat Work+ to spam or harass other users.
Prohibited Conduct.bullet4: Attempt to hack, disrupt, or interfere with the app's functionality.
Prohibited Conduct.bullet5: Collect or store personal data of other users without authorization.
Prohibited Conduct.bullet6: Impersonate any person or entity or misrepresent your affiliation with any individual or organization.
Prohibited Conduct.description2: Violating these terms may result in the suspension or termination of your account and possible legal action.

Intellectual Property.title: Intellectual Property
Intellectual Property.description: All content, logos, and intellectual property in Xinchat Work+ are owned by us or our licensors. You are not permitted to copy, modify, or reuse any materials without explicit permission.
Intellectual Property.bullet1: Engage in any illegal or unauthorized activity.
Intellectual Property.bullet2: Upload or share harmful, abusive, or objectionable content, including but not limited to hate speech or explicit materials.

Privacy Policy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy Policy.description: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. By using Xinchat Work+, you consent to our data practices as described in the Privacy Policy.

Limitation of Liability.title: Limitation of Liability
Limitation of Liability.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law:
Limitation of Liability.bullet1: Xinchat Work+ and its affiliates are not responsible for any indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the App.
Limitation of Liability.bullet2: We do not guarantee that the App will be errorfree, uninterrupted, or secure.
Limitation of Liability.bullet3: We are not liable for any loss of data, damages caused by malware, unauthorized access, or other issues beyond our reasonable control.

Termination.title: Termination
Termination.bullet1: Suspend or terminate your access to the App at any time, with or without notice, if you violate these Terms or engage in prohibited behavior.
Termination.bullet2: Remove or disable content that violates these Terms or applicable laws.

Changes to Terms.title: Changes to Terms
Changes to Terms.description: We may update these Terms from time to time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the revised Terms within the App. Your continued use of the App after changes are made indicates your acceptance of the updated Terms.

Governing Law.title: Governing Law & Dispute Resolution
Governing Law.bullet1: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Philippines.
Governing Law.bullet2: Any disputes arising from the use of Xinchat Work+ will be resolved in the courts of the Philippines.

Contact Us.title: Contact Us
Contact Us.description: If you have questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at xinwork@app.indonesiandev.com

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Thank you for choosing Xinchat Work+, a mobile app designed for text-only work chat with notes, sketches, and AI assistance. Protecting your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how Xinchat Work+ collects, uses, stores, and protects your personal information.
privacy.end: By using Xinchat Work+, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms.

Information We Collect.title: Information We Collect
Information We Collect.description: We collect personal data to provide and improve our services. The information collected includes:
Information We Collect.bullet1: Personal Information: Collected during registration, such as name, email address, and other details you provide.
Information We Collect.bullet2: Usage Data: Information about how you interact with the application.

How We Use Your Information.title: How We Use Your Information
How We Use Your Information.description: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
How We Use Your Information.bullet1: Account Registration: To create and manage your user account.
How We Use Your Information.bullet2: Service Improvement: To enhance the performance, security, and functionality of our services.
How We Use Your Information.bullet3: Customer Support: To respond to inquiries and provide assistance.
How We Use Your Information.bullet4: Security and Fraud Prevention: To protect against unauthorized access, misuse, or illegal activity.

Data Storage and Security.title: Data Storage and Security
Data Storage and Security.bullet1: We store your personal information securely in our database. We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.
Data Storage and Security.bullet2: While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your data, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

Third-Party Services.title: Third-Party Services
Third-Party Services.description: We use third-party services to improve our features. Specifically:
Third-Party Services.bullet1: ChatGPT API: To enhance the user experience with AI-powered features.
Third-Party Services.note: We do not share your personal data with third-party companies for marketing or unrelated purposes.

Your Rights.title: Your Rights
Your Rights.description: As a user, you have the following rights:
Your Rights.bullet1: Access Your Data: You can request access to the data we collect about you.
Your Rights.bullet2: Update Your Data: You can request corrections to your personal information.
Your Rights.bullet3: Delete Your Data: You can request the deletion of your personal information from our systems.
Your Rights.note: To exercise these rights, contact us at xinwork@app.indonesiandev.com

Data Retention.title: Data Retention
Data Retention.description: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, or resolve disputes.

Changes to This Privacy Policy.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
Changes to This Privacy Policy.description: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Your continued use of the app after any changes indicates your acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.
Changes to This Privacy Policy.note: You are encouraged to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates.

Contact Us.title: Contact Us
Contact Us.description: If you have questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us: Email: xinwork@app.indonesiandev.com

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Email, call, or complete the form to see how Xinchat Work+ keeps your work chats clear and organized.

box1.title: Customer Support
box1.description: Our support team is available around the clock to address any concerns or queries you may have.

box2.title: Feedback and Suggestions
box2.description: We value your feedback and are continuously working to improve. Your input is crucial in shaping the future of our service.

address.title: Our Location
address.description: Perumahan A. Yani Inside Kav 14 Ikan Piranha, Purwodadi, Blimbing, Malang

Scan the QR code to download the app fro: Scan the QR code to download the app from the App Store.

recruitment.title: Be Part of Our Journey
recruitment.description: Passionate about focused, distraction-free collaboration? Join Xinchat Work+ and help freelancers and small teams communicate and work in one place.
recruitment.teamDescription: At Xinchat Work+, we prioritize clarity and momentum. Together we’ll build the workspace that keeps small teams aligned.

benefits.title: Why Join Us?
benefits.description: We offer a dynamic and inclusive environment where you can thrive. Here are some of the benefits you’ll enjoy.

job1.title: Software Engineer
job1.description: Join our engineering team to build cutting-edge software solutions.

job2.title: Product Manager
job2.description: Help shape the future of our products with user-centric design.

job3.title: UI/UX Designer
job3.description: Design engaging user interfaces and enhance user experiences.

job4.title: Marketing Specialist
job4.description: Develop strategies to boost our brand presence and engagement.

job5.title: Customer Support Representative
job5.description: Provide exceptional support to our clients through various channels.

pricing.title: Select Your Plan and Contact Support to Begin Your Trial
pricing.description: Find the perfect plan for your business with our flexible pricing options.

features.item1Description: Send as many messages as you need with no limits.
features.item2Description: Ensure your chats are completely secure with end-to-end encryption.
features.item3Description: Access the chat app from any device, anytime.

free.title: Free Plan
free.description: Perfect for individuals or small teams.

pro.title: Pro Plan
pro.description: For growing businesses with advanced features.

pricing.customPricing: Interested in our services? Contact our team.

download.title: Bring your Work Space anywhere
download.subtitle: with focused chat + AI
download.description: Install Xinchat Work+ on every device to keep chat, notes, sketches, and AI in sync wherever you work.
download.downloadDescription: Move from conversations to action with one workspace for chat, notes, sketches, and AI.
